# Tic Tac Toe Game (React JS)
[Check The Live Demo]([/game-tic-tac-toe/](https://grione.github.io/game-tic-tac-toe/))

![Tic Tac Toe](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35578611/334839174-7fc0fbf5-9257-4855-b0ce-da2a67ac2cc8.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..pGvHToNao4zYLVKcX9_5y8qFM8IOTSWlRP-y2PVPfxA) <!-- Replace with the actual link to your app's screenshot -->

## Description

This project is a classic Tic Tac Toe game implemented using React. It is an educational project for practicing UI development and state management with React.

## Stack
- React JS
- HTML5
- CSS
- Vite

## Features
- It is possible to enter the names of the players
- The game takes into account the tied score
- Output of simple logs

## How to run locally
- install dependencies
``` npm install ```
- start local server via Vite
``` npm start dev ```
